attributes.action: Recognise Captain Tom Moore in recognition of his extreme efforts for the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
This gent is 100 years old and has swept the country away with his selfless act to support those who are helping us at this time

He is a silver lining on a dark cloud
attributes.background: I would like a statement from the Prime Minister and a formal recognition in terms of an MBE or Knighthood

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
